BBEX3.A.HTG.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates (reference rates) for the US dollar in Haiti / USD 1 = HTG ...

General: From 12 April 1919 to 1 March 1992, the official exchange rate was USD 1 = HTG 5. However, since 16 September 1991, all foreign exchange transactions have been settled at flexible exchange rates.

Source: Since October 1994: Banque de la Republique d'Haiti, Port-au-Prince. June 1994 - September 1994: Banque de Promotion Commerciale et Industrielle S.A. (Promobank), Port-au-Prince. 1992 - May 1994: Banque Nationale de Paris, Port-au-Prince.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
